title: Princess Gao Chang - Novel Updates

description:
After transmigrating into the dying ancient Xiyu kingdom, Ji Wan came across that fearsome man.

His beauty was without peer, his cruelty was endless and his thirsting for blood legend. 

He was the King under the Sky Mountain. 

And his overbearing love made her want to flee in panic…>
